means: 邀请( invite的过去式和过去分词 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: If possible , to be an invited painter for the Liana Art Space ., 青藤子艺术空间欢迎艺术家来借此展示 , 建议及合作 , 并有机会成为本空间的特邀画家.
you are all invited to our open bar ., 你们都会受邀去到我们公开派对.
A delegation of British parliamentarian is invited to visit Canada ., 一个英国议员代表团应邀访问加拿大.
we are invited to a small social gathering ., 我们被邀请参加一个小型社交聚会.

entry.def: If you invite someone to something such as a party or a meal, you ask them to come to it.

example.ex: She invited him to her 26th birthday party in New Jersey...
example.tran: 她邀请他去参加她在新泽西举行的 26 岁生日聚会。

example.ex: I invited her in for a coffee...

entry.def: If you are invited to do something, you are formally asked or given permission to do it.

example.ex: At a future date, managers will be invited to apply for a management buy-out...
example.tran: 在将来的某天,经理们将受邀进行管理层收购。

example.ex: The person concerned would be shown the evidence in private and invited to stand down...
example.tran: 将会向有关人员私下出示该证据,并要求其暂时离开证人席。

entry.def: If something you say or do invites trouble or criticism, it makes trouble or criticism more likely.

example.ex: I realise that an Englishman who generalises about Ireland invites trouble...
example.tran: 我意识到英国人如果对爱尔兰问题加以泛化的话会招惹麻烦。

example.ex: Their refusal to compromise will inevitably invite more criticism from the UN.
example.tran: 他们拒绝妥协必然会引发联合国的更多批评。

entry.def: An invite is an invitation to something such as a party or a meal.

example.ex: They haven't got an invite to the wedding.
example.tran: 他们还没收到参加婚礼的请柬。

auth_sentence.content: The researchers invited me to have my brain scanned.
auth_sentence.res_content: The researchers invited me to have my brain scanned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The researchers invited me to have my brain scanned.

auth_sentence.content: I think we invited a bit too much pressure.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think we invited a bit too much pressure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think we invited a bit too much pressure.

auth_sentence.content: Later, he invited various UK-based musicians to contribute.
auth_sentence.res_content: Later, he invited various UK-based musicians to contribute.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Later, he invited various UK-based musicians to contribute.

Sentence.sentence: Today's presentation will show how we see the development of the motor car in the short to medium term, and that is why we have invited all of you here today.
She was invited to work as an English teacher.
Tony's mother has invited me to dinner.
Soon after I arrived, the chief executive of the agency that had invited us took me aside.
Julie has been invited for dinner
